subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The diagram example demonstrates the integration of SchemaCrawler with GraphViz.

ol.li: Install Graphviz, and make sure that Graphviz is on your path.
Copy the schemacrawler.config.properties file into the diagram example directory.
Start the database server by running StartDatabaseServer script from the distribution directory.
Start a command shell in the diagram example directory.
Try using include and exclude expressions in include and exclude certain tables.
